original_question: In medicine, stomatitis affects which part of the body?
diverse_qns: Which part of the body is impacted by stomatitis in the field of medicine?
Stomatitis is a medical condition that affects which area of the body?
In which bodily region would you find symptoms of stomatitis?
Can you tell me which part of the body is afflicted by stomatitis?
Where in the human body does stomatitis typically present itself?
Which specific area of the body is impacted by the medical condition called stomatitis?
Which part of the body is usually affected when a person has stomatitis?
Stomatitis typically affects which bodily region?
In terms of anatomy, where would you expect to see the effects of stomatitis?
Stomatitis, in medicine, is known to affect which area of the human body?
pred_ans: Stomatitis affects the oral cavity or mouth.
pred_diverse_ans: Stomatitis refers to inflammation of the mucous membranes lining the mouth and can affect various parts of the body in the field of medicine.
Stomatitis is a medical condition that affects the mouth and/or lips.
Symptoms of stomatitis can be found in the oral cavity.
The part of the body afflicted by stomatitis is the mouth.
Stomatitis typically presents itself in the mouth.
The medical condition called stomatitis affects the oral cavity, specifically the mucous membranes lining the mouth and gums.
The mouth and lips are usually affected when a person has stomatitis.
Stomatitis typically affects the oral cavity.
The effects of stomatitis would be seen in the mouth, specifically on the gums and inside the cheeks.
Stomatitis refers to inflammation of the mucous membranes lining the oral cavity, commonly known as mouth sores.
